attributes.action: Give babies born under 24 weeks a right to live and give medical treatment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many babies are born under 24 weeks are breathing  and their little heart is beating. Under current legislation doctors can refuse to treat the child and leave them to die. I feel this is unfair and EVERY  child should be given the chance to live. Please sign this petition to try and turn this legislation around.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to give babies born under 24 weeks a right to live and give medical treatment.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=24weeks


Her Majesty's Government
